entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 6.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
